```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
schedule <- tribble(
  ~Time, ~Topic, 
  "9a-11:00", "Web Scraping: Gathering Data from Websites", 
  "11-11:15","Break",
  "11:15-Noon","OpenRefine: Data Cleaning, Part 1", 
  "Noon-1","Lunch",
  "1p-2:30","OpenRefine Data Cleaning, Part 2 & Reconciliation", 
  "2:30-2:45","Break",
  "2:45-4:30","Twitter Stream Gathering.  Also More Parsing:  HTML, JSON, APIs"
)

datatable(schedule, rownames = FALSE, 
          options = list(dom = 't'))
```
